DataElement.preferredName: Health Care Provider Learning Or Memory Problem Notification Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the severity of learning or memory problems that you have when notified by your healthcare provider.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The act, process, or experience of gaining knowledge or skill._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The power of retaining and recalling past experience, something that is remembered._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Mild (does not interfere with my work, school, or general life. I did not need special help in school)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Mild (does not interfere with my work, school, or general life. I did not need special help in school)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Moderate (interferes with my work, school, or general life, but I am capable of independent living. I used special help in school)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Moderate (interferes with my work, school, or general life, but I am capable of independent living. I used special help in school)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Severe (I am significantly impaired in my school or work performance or in my general life)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Severe (I am significantly impaired in my school or work performance or in my general life)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Disabling (I am unable to perform daily activities such as taking care of myself; I require full-time help or I am living in an institution for people with disabling conditions)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Disabling (I am unable to perform daily activities such as taking care of myself; I require full-time help or I am living in an institution for people with disabling conditions)
